last_episode_to_air.name: Aprézan nou Iyanné
last_episode_to_air.overview: A surprise attack sends Obé over the edge. Luisa embarks on a perilous mission. As more Désandans arrive, an epic showdown unfolds at the school.

name: Mortel
overview: Sofiane, Victor and Luisa, three seemingly incompatible teenagers find themselves bound together by a supernatural force.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: When Obé returns — in a startling new form — and begins to raise an army of followers at the school, Sofiane, Victor and Luisa race to stop a disaster.

episodes.name: Super Bad
episodes.overview: Determined to find his missing brother, high school troublemaker Sofiane ropes timid classmate Victor into a pact with a mysterious figure.

episodes.name: Hot. Hot. Hot.
episodes.overview: As Sofiane experiments with his new powers, Victor discovers he has a gift of his own. School counselor Audrey investigates a troubling trend.

episodes.name: Nothing Nudes Under The Moon
episodes.overview: Rumors about the night of the party send Luisa on a desperate quest for answers, and drive a wedge between Victor and Sofiane.

episodes.name: Don't You Know That You're Toxic
episodes.overview: After exposing the source of the video, Sofiane and Victor zero in on a new suspect, and Luisa gets a terrifying glimpse of their powers.

episodes.name: La Solitudine
episodes.overview: A journey into a classmate's mind leaves Victor traumatized. Luisa uses Voodoo to help Sofiane track down the house from Reda's video.

episodes.name: The Puppets' Tears
episodes.overview: With their lives spiraling out of control, Victor and Sofiane set out to confront the killer, and Luisa hatches a plan to banish Obé.

episodes.name: Super Good
episodes.overview: Victor returns from the hospital to find Sofiane and Luisa locked in a fresh struggle with Obé — under the watchful eye of a new school nurse.

episodes.name: Entwined With You
episodes.overview: Sofiane realizes the Marking may have unintended consequences. Luisa faces a harrowing test. A blackout leads Victor to a disturbing discovery.

episodes.name: Impossible To Leave
episodes.overview: Obé challenges Sofiane to a fight to decide Reda's fate once and for all. Meanwhile, Victor confronts a painful chapter from his past.

episodes.name: The Marriage of Obé
episodes.overview: While her grandmother tends to Victor, Luisa gets her first glimpse of the Power. A revelation draws everyone into the woods for a nighttime ceremony.

episodes.name: Qumran
episodes.overview: A road trip to find a new victim for Obé turns into an emotional odyssey as Victor, Sofiane and Luisa grapple with haunting memories.

episodes.name: Aprézan nou Iyanné
episodes.overview: A surprise attack sends Obé over the edge. Luisa embarks on a perilous mission. As more Désandans arrive, an epic showdown unfolds at the school.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: When Obé returns — in a startling new form — and begins to raise an army of followers at the school, Sofiane, Victor and Luisa race to stop a disaster.
